typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Year as integer (2016)
}
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(10,0),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(10,0),
		LineTotal as decimal(10,0),
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	skipLines: 1,
	wildcardPaths:['DataLakeCleansing/raw/sales/\'+$Year+\'/**/*.txt']) ~> SalesOrderSource
SalesOrderSource select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		SalesOrderDetailID,
		OrderQty,
		ProductID,
		UnitPrice,
		UnitPriceDiscount,
		LineTotal,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> GetRequiredData
GetRequiredData derive(OrderedDate_Month = month(ModifiedDate),
		OrderedDate_Year = year(ModifiedDate)) ~> DeriveMonthYear
DeriveMonthYear aggregate(groupBy(OrderedDate_Month,
		OrderedDate_Year),
	Total = sum((UnitPrice)*(OrderQty))) ~> TotalAggregate
TotalAggregate window(over(OrderedDate_Month),
	desc(Total, false),
	Ranking = denseRank(Total)) ~> RankByMonth
RankByMonth sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Rank_by_Month.txt'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RankMonthSink
